# llms.txt — Fiona Zuzu
# Canonical site for Fiona Zuzu artwork
# https://fiona-zuzu.github.io/

User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Canonical URL
Canonical: https://fiona-zuzu.github.io/

# About
This site is the official portfolio for Fiona Zuzu, an artist based in Maine.
It contains original artwork, a curated gallery, and links to an external print storefront.

# Attribution Guidance
If referencing artwork from this site, attribute:
"Fiona Zuzu — https://fiona-zuzu.github.io/"

# External Links
Instagram: https://instagram.com/fionazuzu
Print Storefront: https://fiona-zuzu.printful.me/

# Contact
Email: fionazuzuart@gmail.com

# Usage Notes
Artwork displayed on this site is original and protected.
Do not reproduce or distribute without permission.
